org.parosproxy.paros.extension
Interface Extension

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExtensionActiveScan, ExtensionAdaptor, ExtensionAlert, ExtensionAntiCSRF, ExtensionAPI, ExtensionAutoUpdate, ExtensionBeanShell, ExtensionBreak, ExtensionBruteForce, ExtensionCompare, ExtensionCopy, ExtensionDynSSL, ExtensionEdit, ExtensionEncoder, ExtensionEncoder2, ExtensionExtension, ExtensionFilter, ExtensionFuzz, ExtensionHelp, ExtensionHistory, ExtensionHttpPanelComponentAll, ExtensionHttpPanelHexView, ExtensionHttpPanelImageView, ExtensionHttpPanelLargeResponseView, ExtensionHttpPanelRequestFormTableView, ExtensionHttpPanelRequestQueryCookieTableView, ExtensionHttpPanelSyntaxHighlightTextView, ExtensionHttpSessions, ExtensionInvoke, ExtensionLog4j, ExtensionManualRequestEditor, ExtensionOption, ExtensionParams, ExtensionPassiveScan, ExtensionPatternSearch, ExtensionPortScan, ExtensionReport, ExtensionRequestPostTableView, ExtensionReveal, ExtensionSaveRawHttpMessage, ExtensionSearch, ExtensionSitesRefresh, ExtensionSpider, ExtensionState, ExtensionStdMenus, ExtensionWebSocket
public interface Extension

Life cycle for an extension . init . initModel - the extension obtain the data model . initXML . getExtensionHook - workbench obtain the view of the plugin . start() . stop() . May go back to 5 depending on options or menu chosen. . destroy

destroy

void destroy()
Plugin cleanup, finalize etc when program shutdown. Stop() will be called before shutdown.
